11.content:
Naruto was really angry for some reason even after beating up Mizuki and becoming a Genin.

He left Iruka that night going to his apartment which got ransacked again by the stupid villagers!

Naruto growled, "I can't take it anymore!" He tried to see the best in everyone but nothing worked! He was still hated! He then thought of his peers especially a certain five! Kiba was once was his best friend but one year he started picking on him like everyone else..then Shikamaru and Choji joined in...they used to be his friends! But now they're just like everyone else! Sakura he had saved her from bullies when she was younger and she used to be sweet to him but when she met that Ino girl she changed and became just like her an arrogant heartless Sasuke-loving bitch!

The blond's hatred that he tried to stem all these years was coming up in one big burst...golden energy began to surround him.

He read the usual messages by the villagers, "GO TO HELL! DEMON JUST DIE! WE'LL AVENGE OUR LOVED ONES!"

That did it! Something within Naruto began to awaken and this strange force frightened even the Kyuubi. Then the force washed over the fox freeing it of the illusion it was placed under.
Naruto roared, "FINE SCREW THEM!!! I DON'T NEED ANYONE!!!!" His energy flared up more and created a masive shockwave throughout the village...

Sakura, Kiba, Shikamaru, and Choji all sneezed and shivered feeling like they would regret ever abandoning a certain blond who once was their greatest treasure and friend until they chose to abandon him.

The Next morning Naruto woke up still angry with the village...he now was 4'10 he had grown a few inches....his hair was longer his eyes now had wisdom beyond his years. He then got up and went to his closet looking for some new clothes...He found them and placed them on.
He now wore an all black outfit.

Naruto then instinctively waved his finger and a powerful illusion appeared around his home.

The blond then walked out of his house and made it seem like he walked out of nowhere...
As he headed for the academy the civilians all sneered at him only to be shocked as he completely ignored them.
One idiot actually threw a rock at Naruto's head only to be shocked as the rock suddenly froze in mid air then returned right back at him. The rock hit the idiot hard giving him a rather nasty knot on his head.

The civilians were now wondering, 'What's with him? He's never fought back before! h-have we finally gone too far?! Have we been wrong all this time?! If so then may Kami had mercy on our souls!'

A certain pink haired woman who was Sakura's mother saw the boy and was shocked at how much he favored the Yondaime in appearance.

When Naruto got to the academy someone called out to him, "Hey baka."
11.title: A young god's awakening

111.content:
Naruto growled as he turned to see a certain pink haired girl with a huge forehead and red dress like outfit come up.

Sakura had gotten here before Ino to see Sasuke only to be disappointed when it was the baka but then as she looked at him a memory came back to her one that Ino had apparently altered to outset her obsession with Sasuke,
Sakura's eyes widened as she began to remember what Naruto did for her in the past then she met Ino...Ino was so popular yet Naruto had been a true friend he had helped her against the bullies before Ino even knew she existed...But when Ino offered her a chance to be liked by everyone she without thinking just took it and joined Ino and the other girls in picking on Naruto.

Naruto gave a cold glare to the girl that made even Sasuke's glare seem tame in comparsion. Sakura was frozen just from the steeliness of the glance.

He then spoke coldly. "What do you want Haruno?" The way he said her last name like they were nothing more than just classmates sent sharp pains into her heart. It hurt bad even Sasuke's rejections didn't sting as bad as this.

Naruto just sneered before returning to a cold stare. "If you're not going to speak Haruno then just stay out of my sight. After all I am just a nuisance to you. Just go to your bitch of a friend and that bastard you all deserve each other!" He turned and walked into the building. His harsh words cut into Sakura's heart like knives.

Sakura was about to yell at him but as more memories of her past with Naruto came up she began to realize she had screwed up...big time, Sakura watched the blond's back with tears in her eyes before she fell to her knees practically bawling with her hands over her face, realizing she had messed up bad. She had abandoned a true friend and the only possible guy in the village that actually ever liked her all because of...her foolish desires to be liked by everyone. From the way Naruto looked at her and spoke to her earlier it looked like she didn't have any hope of ever getting him back.

Ino came up only to be shocked as she saw Sakura bawling....the blond girl ran up to her friend and asked. "Sakura? What's wrong? Did Sasuke reject you again?"

The crying girl shook her head vehemently. "N-No... it's...Naruto...h-h-he hates me!"

Ino gained a dark look. "What did that baka do you?!"

Sakura cried out. "No! He's not the baka here! I AM! He was the only boy of our age group who didn't make fun of me....he actually complimented me! He liked me! And I just..." She started bawling again. Ino was shocked what kind of past did Sakura have with Naruto to make her cry so much?

Ino wanted answers....but she couldn't just leave her best friend out here.
111.title: Sakura's pain

1111.content:
' I am going to get to the bottom of this. And I will by asking Naruto-baka' Ino thought as she continued to comfort Sakura.

____________________________________________________________________________ ___________________________________________________________

Naruto walked in and, after ignoring all of the stares he was getting from the other students, sat down in at a table in the back. He lied his head on it and stared at the chalkboard at the bottom. He decided to go to sleep since he already knew how the teams would be formed.

Right as he almost dozed off he heard a 'Naruto-baka!'. He moaned to himself and looked up seeing Ino. " What?" he asked.

" What did you do to Sakura and what kind of past did you have with her!" she barked at as an order. " Go ask Haruno I want to go to sleep," he said as he laid his head on the table. Ino was shocked. Whenever she ordered him to do something before he always did it, but now he just flat out refuses. She couldn't take it. " Tell me now or else I'll beat you into a pulp like I always do when you annoy me!!!" she yelled.

She was staring at him one second and seething in pain another. She was now stuck in the wall with blood going down her stomach and back. She saw that Naruto was glaring at her now so she guessed he was the one who did this, but she didn't even see him move. She pulled herself out and went to a seat choosing not to bother Naruto right now. After a few minutes all of the students who passed finally arrived so Iruka started to call off teams.

When he got to Team 7, he called off," Team 7 will consist of Sasuke Uchiha, Sakura Haruno, and Naruto Uzumaki, now next," Sakura sat there shocked before thinking 'Yes I can finally apologize to Naruto and hopefully we can be friends again.'

After finishing Iruka left and let the teams wait for their senseis. The rest of the teams left with their senseis and Naruto finally woke up, but he started to meditate so he could keep everything outside away. After a few hours their sensei finally appeared. The sensei who appeared was...
1111.title: Ino confronts Naruto during class

11111.content:
As Kakashi walked in only this came out team where going to have a special
Person join us.who will that person be.
11111.title: Kakashi Hatake

111111.content:
As soon as he said that Naruto looked at and whats S.H.E.L.D.
Kakahi just said from another universe.
Susuke looked scared and said is it like ours.
Kakahi was still looking at Naruto and saw all the hate his when herd Susuke.He just manged to say no.
Just then a 12 year old walked in he was wearing a blue jump suit and too desert hanging on each gun holster.
Hello my name is Tommy hughes S.H.E.L.D commander Tommy hughes.
I've been sent to train with you.Hughes after saying those words looked Naruto strange way.
Are you Naruto yeah Naruto said trying not sound mean,Your the hokage right hughes.No im not with chilling voice.
Oh my bad you see are people thought you were due you being the stongest.Naruro looked at him and said nothing.
You dont think your the srongest.then Hughes took out his phone and Naruto saw his fill it full all his personel stuff,
Susuke and Sukeura were mad now Hughes did not even bother look at them just Naurto.
111111.title: S.H.E.L.D

choices: Skip ahead to the teams' meetings with their senseis
Shikamaru, Choji, Kiba approach Naruto and beg him for forgiveness
1112.content:
Ino hugged her crying friend, "I'm here for you Sakura." Sakura wept in her embrace, "I-It hurts... It hurts so much Ino! I miss Naruto deeply! I was foolish to abandon him! I want MY Naruto back!" Ino looked at her best friend with deep guilt and regret, "I'm sorry Sakura it was my foolish offer that made you abandon the only boy who ever liked you...I think we should rekindle our friendship Sakura ,I'm tired of trying to obtain a boy, who doesn't even notice me." Sakura looked up with teary green eyes, "I-Ino...I agree!" The two girls have become best friends once again, they have agreed to stop wasting their lives trying to get an ungrateful boy to notice them. Now Ino looked at Sakura, "Sakura I make a new vow, that I will help you get Naruto back no matter what!" The now once-again best friends smiled at each other with new hope in their hearts and went into the building together...They were knocked aside quite rudely by the Hyuga Heiress Hyuga Hinata...who brushed past them during her arrival on purpose.

Hinata sneered as she looked down her nose at the lower-class girls, "Oh sorry... I didn't realize the trash was still out." Hinata had dark blue hair in hime-cut style, with chin-length strands framing her face. She wore a black open zip jacket and black pants that showed off her well-endowed figure underneath the jacket she wore a black fishnet-collar shirt that revealed a bit of her cleavage and the tops of her large C cup breasts...Hinata was the most developed young kunoichi this year and the kunoichi of the year with Sakura coming at a close second...Being the Hyuga heiress she was practically Konoha's princess yet she was in love with Naruto the now-former class clown...something that irked Naruto's rival considering he was interested in Hinata but she didn't even give him the time of day.

Hinata smiled and went over to Naruto to greet him, 'I'll show you Naruto-kun...that you don't need that pink-haired weakling or any friends...I'M all you need...after all it is destiny for us to be together.'

Ino helped Sakura up while glaring at the Hyuga girl's retreating back, "What a bitch."

Sakura glared as well seeing Hinata going over to HER Naruto, she clenched her fists, 'Bitch! Naruto-kun is MINE!'

A boy in the middle row with dark-blue/black hair shaped like a chicken watched the beautiful girl go over to his rival with envy in his eyes he wore a high-collared blue shirt and tan shorts with white blue-lined wristed bands on his wrists. He was Uchiha Sasuke the only survivor of the 'Uchiha Massacre' hince his title the Last Uchiha...He was Naruto's rival and the reason why Sakura, Kiba, Shikamaru, and Choji all abandoned Naruto...He was the rookie of the year and when he first met Hinata he felt something toward her...how ironic, he ignores all of his fangirls yet he's interested in the mose popular girl, but she doesn't love him, no she loved his 'loser' rival...

Naruto was sleeping ignoring everything but thanks to his newly-awakened deity powers he can sense everything that goes on around him....Suddenly Naruto felt a pair of arms wrap aroun him and felt two large and soft pillows pressing against his neck...He snapped open his eyes and smelled the scent of lavender, "H-Hinata-chan..." Despite his new powers, Naruto's shy around this girl.

Hinata leaned and whispered sensually into Naruto's ear, "Hello Naruto-kun... how are you today?"

Naruto stiffened blushing, "I-I-I'm fine Hinata-chan."

Hinata giggled, "Aw ! You're so cute when you're nervous Na-ru-to-kun..." She purred out slowly, then made Naruto nearly jump by licking his ear in a sexy manner, "Maybe we'll be on the same team...And then I can finally make you mine."

Sakura was trying to hold back the urge to beat Hinata to a bloody pulp knowing the Hyuga was stronger than her...and it hurt to see Naruto reacting toward her...

Soon their Teacher Umino Iruka arrived and began to announce the teams...Team 7: Uchiha Sasuke, Yamanaka Ino, and Inuzuka Kiba (Not following Canon get over it!), Team 8: Uzumaki Naruto, Hyuga Hinata, and Haruno Sakura, Team 10 (Remember Team 9 is Gai's Team): Nara, Shikamaru, Akimichi Choji, and Aburame Shino.

Hinata grinned and licked Naruto's ear again, "Well Naruto-kun it seems destiny is on our side."

Naruto nearly fainted from the sheer pleasure.

Sakura was about to cheer, until she remember Naruto was still angry towards her so she calmed herself and looked at him, 'Don't worry Naruto-kun I'll get you to forgive me somehow and then I'll really make it up to you for abandoning you.' Her Inner Self cheered her on, "CHA! we can do it we can earn Naruto-kun's forgiveness!"

Sasuke groaned, 'Damn it why did the dobe get Hinata on his team! I'm stuck with a fangirl and a mutt!'

Kiba looked at Naruto with regret, "I wonder if this is punishment for abandoning him?" He whispered softly.

Akamaru looked down at him like he was an idiot, 'What an idiot why did I have to choose HIM as my partner, of course it's punishment for abandoning Naruto you moron, your mother Tsume-sama was very angry when she found out!'

Kiba wasn't the only one regretting his abandonment of Naruto both Shikamaru and Choji were also regretting it...Choji especially since he had been teased in their younger days as well about his weight and Shikamaru was viewed as a 'lazy-good-for-nothing' loser who would die on his first mission.
1112.title: The rekindled friendship and bitchy Hyugas

11122.content:
Class ended and everyone went to lunch.

After Sakura finished eating she went to find Naruto before that bitch Hinata could. "Where is he!" she thought to herself when she saw him walking out of the lunch room. Naruto being the god he is no longer needs to eat to live so he figured he would go test his newly found powers when he heard Sakura calling him. "Naruto!" She called while running after him. Naruto turned around to yell at her when Hinata appeared in front of him. "Hey Naruto-kun!" she said as she kissed him. Sakura came to a stop ten feet away when she saw Hinata kiss Naruto. "H-hi H-hinata, w-what's up?" Naruto asked when she stoped kissing him. "Nothing much, Naruto-kun. I just thought we could hang out together." Hinata said turning around to see Sakura who was standing there the whole time. "What do you want billboard brow?" Hinata said while getting closer to Naruto. Sakura snapped when she heard her old nickname that was used to make fun of her big forehead. "You just shut the fuck up! I'm here to talk to Naruto!" she screamed as loud as she could. "Don't you yell at me you bitch!" Hinata screamed just as loud. While Hinata and Sakura continued to yell at each other, Naruto went to sit and watch the show just because he was bord and he didn't want to get involved. The girls went at it for about five minutes when Hinata got tired of fighting with Sakura and went to go calm down. Naruto saw this and got up to leave when Sakura ran up to him. "Naruto, can we talk?" she said. Naruto turned around and said "Why the hell should I talk to you or any one other than Hinata and Iruka! Huh, let me guess your here to try to get me to be your friend again. Is that it?" Sakura looked down and started crying as she said " Look, I'm sorry ok. I made a big mistake. I left you all alone when Ino asked me to be friends with her. I'm sorry, please Naruto! Forgiveshe ran at him and hugged him. "Is that all you have to say?" Naruto said pushing her away. "Your sorry, that's it. You have no idea how much crap I went through just to get you to say hi to me and now that I stop you want me to just forgive you!" He screamed creating a shockwave that made Sakura fall down. "Untill you see just how much you hurt me I will only see you as the bitch who left me all alone." Naruto said as he walked away leaveing Sakura crying.
11122.title: The Teams have lunch

choices: Kurama (Kyuubi) appears next to him with a confused face
111221.content:
After Naruto left Sakura, who is still crying, he went back to his apartment to get some sleep. Suddenly he felt someone wrap their arms around his neck and two soft objects press against his back. He automatically knew who it was. "Naruto-kun...where are you going?" Hinata asked him as she rubbed her breasts into his back making him have a nosebleed.

"I-I'm just heading home," Naruto told her nervously as he tried to get her off. Hinata though held onto him even tighter. "Can I come?" she asked as she nibbled on his ear. Naruto was blushing so much you could almost see steam blowing out of his ears.In a panic, he threw up his arms, slinging her off of himself, and ran as fast as he could back to his house.

"Aw, he's so cute when he's nervous," Hinata said after standing back up from the ground. Sakura just sniffed and wiped away her tears before walking back to the Academy to see Ino.

_____________________________________________________________

"Phew...too close. I could almost smell the lust coming from Hinata. *sigh* Why must she do this too me? I don't have a crush on her. I think she's trying to force herself on me! I really want some sleep. If I know Kakashi he won't be back at the Academy to meet my team for a few hours so that I long enough for me to get some sleep," Naruto said to himself.

As he walked he heard a voice in his head. "Hey Naruto-kun come here." Naruto sighed as he finally got home, jumped in bed, and went to sleep so he can get to his mindscape.

"Yes Kurama-chan (Kyuubi's real name)?" Naruto asked as he got in there. Suddenly his face was enveloped by two huge breasts that are easily larger than Hinata's, probably about DD-cups. "I'm happy you're finally here!" she squealed as she hugged him with even more force and suffocating him. Now Naruto may be stronger than Kurama will ever be, but he will never be able to defeat her when it comes to fear, emotions, and threats." Yeah, I am here. What did you want?" Naruto asked her.

"I wanted to talk with you. We haven't talked for awhile and I missed you," she said with a pouting face causing Naruto to blush. Naruto sighed as he nodded, but almost had a nosebleed when she sat on his lap. "Aw, is little Naru-chan nervous?" she asked playfully as she poked his cheek. Naruto glared at her, but she just ignored it and smiled. "So how are you feeling? Especially with Haruno's apology?" Kurama asked him with a serious face. Naruto just shrugged his shoulders." "I don't really know. It was unexpected and a part of me feels sad that I did it, but still I won't forgive her after all the shit she put me through!" Naruto yelled angrily, but called down when Kurama rubbed his head. "Okay. Naruto-kun sadly it's almost time for you to get back to the Academy," Kurama told him.

" What, but it feels like I've been here for a few minutes," Naruto said confused. Kurama just shrugged her shoulders before smiling and kissing his cheek. "Come back soon Naruto-kun!" she yelled as she got off him and he woke back up.
111221.title: To the team meetings

choices: It stops becuase of kurama in a couple minuites
1112212.content: Naruto then woke up and started getting up but halfway through he gave kurama a kiss full on the lips. He started getting out of bed slowly and looked at kurama in confusion. "what the fuck" naruto said. He got ready to go to the academy to meet his team with Kurama following behind him. They where whishiling. When they got to the acadmey kakashi was already there. He looked confused as to see 4 people instead of 3. Hinata was pissed to see another girl with naruto sakura was pissed for the same reason. Sakura and hinata said "what are you doing with my man!?". Kurama said "your man? I've known him much longer than you two. Hinata said " i've known him since i was 5. I've known him since we where 3 said sakura. Kurama retaliated with " i've known him since he was born. Naruto started talking with kakashi." This could be awhile" said naruto." Why" asked Kakashi. You have 2 stubborn girls and the strongest demon fighting over there love, friend, and host + love says naruto.
1112212.title: A wild kurama appeared

111222.content:
Lunch ended and everyone went back to class.

Hinata ran up to Naruto and grabbed his arm before Sakura walked in.

"Were do you wanna sit Naruto-kun?" Hinata asked as Sakura joined them.

Naruto looked around the class room and saw the only desk left was in the front.

"Looks like we'll have to sit in the front. of the class."

The Naruto walked over and sat down with Hinata before Sakura followed them.

"Ok, everyone listen up. Your sensei will be waiting for you at the site of your first mission. Send one person from your team to come get the information pactets you'll need."

Naruto pushed Sakura forward signaling her to get the paper before walking to the door with Hinata.

After Sakura gather the information, the team meet Kakashi at the training yard near the forest.

"Everyone ready for the mission?" Kakashi asked as he arrived.

"Yeah, now the you finally showed up." Naruto said as he held Hinata, who was kissing his neck.
111222.title: to the first team misson

1112222.content:
Kakashi looked at Naruto before he walked up to Sakura.

"You are the right group, but your profiles must be a bit out of date." He said.

"This a recent change, nothing like this was going on when the files were writen." Sakura answered.

"I hope this will not effect our mission."

"I'm sure that it wont."

"Alright," Kakashi said, "Your mission, is to take these bells from me."

He held up two bells and looked at the group.

"There are only two of them." Sakura said.

"Yes, the two who get bells well pass the mission and get the reward, which is lunch on me. But the one who does not get a bell will be tied to that post and forced to watch the others eat."

"Can you do that?" Sakura asked.

"I was the one who created this mission so...yes." Kakashi answered.

"Let's get this over with." Naruto said as he stood up.
1112222.title: Other

choices: Team up. But only with Hinata.
Team up with both Hinata and Sakura.
11122221.content:
Kakashi took the gennin to the training camp. Once they arrived there, Kakashi holds the bells, and turn to the gennin.
“I should thell you, before we start, that if you cannot get the bells before sunset, I will fail you all, and send you back to the academy.”
“What?!” Sakura and Hinata shout, at the same time, “You can’t possibly do that.”
“Yes I-” Kakashi starts, but gets cut off by Naruto who says “Yes, he can”.
Everyone is surprised by Naruto response, as far as Kakashi heard about him, he should’ve started complaining and shouting. But it was the opposite. Naruto was completely calm. He knew that, with his new powers, he could end this quickly.
‘It won’t be hard to get those bells.’ he thought to himself, but someone thought it was a bad idea.

‘NARUTO!’ the Nine Tails said, ‘THIS IS NOT A GOOD IDEA! IF YOU USE YOUR POWERS, HE MAY GROW SUSPICIOUS, AND MAYBE WILL EVEN KICK YOU OUT OF THE TEAM!”
‘Then what do you suggest?’
‘TRY USING THE TECHNIQUES YOU ALREADY KNOW BUT TO THEIR FULLEST! MAYBE TEAM UP WITH THE GIRLS!’
‘Are you sure?’
‘YES!’
‘Right, so I’ll…’
11122221.title: The bell test

choices: Long live the Akatsuki! (...with new goals...)
12.content:
How shall we proceed? Because Naruto isn't going to get godly powers by saying, "I want godly powers."

Choice 1: Naruto finds a book half buried near a large, dead tree. This book contains knowledge of demons. True demons, rather than what the people of the elemental nations see as demons. Demons that have travelled across countless worlds and seek to destroy all life, in every world. Together, these demons are known as the Burning Legion. The Legion is led by the Fallen Titan, Sargeras. (Here's a picture: http://static.tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pub/im... )

Choice 2: Naruto, while training by himself, finds an injured, and hungry, Akatsuki member and helps him (unless it's Konan, in that case, her) out. In exchange for this act of kindness, he/she takes Naruto as a subordinate to the Akatsuki. During his time as a subordinate, Naruto is also taught by the Akatsuki members. (The Akatsuki will have a different goal than 'capture the tailed beasts' if you pick this choice.) ( http://img05.deviantart.net/c4f2/i/2009/... )

Choice 3: Naruto is kidnapped by a tall man with no face to serve as one of his proxies. ( http://orig11.deviantart.net/53e4/f/2013... ) ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ImRi6lFS... )

122332222.title: Plantman?

choices: Go find a brain, and come up with a GOOD choice! Can you do that?
124.content:
Have you ever heard of the Borg? They are some of the, if not the, most feared species/group in Star Trek. They seek biological and technological perfection, but the most efficient way to do so is to forcibly assimilate all other species into their collective, thus creating new borg drones and purging them of individual thoughts. The only (known) borg that have individuality are the queen(s), and a certain borg known as Locutus of borg (it means 'he who speaks'). Borg abilities include, but are not limited to very powerful, and highly adaptive, shields (at most, a certain attack can work 4 times if you're lucky before every single borg is immune to the attack. i.e. a fireball jutsu would only kill a few borg compared to the millions right behind them), superior strength (think just below Tsunade strength, but they rarely use that), injection tubercles in each arm (once someone is injected, the borg drone sends out nano-probes into the victims blood, immediately transforming them into borg drones), and many other abilities. If you pick this option, Naruto will be assimilated and become known as 'Locutus of borg'. I'd normally go with a different name, but the borg aren't very imaginative, and this does fit. I put some videos and a wiki page below if you want to know more.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WZEJ4OJT...
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hNxPTk9g...
http://en.memory-alpha.wikia.com/wiki/Bo...
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PVjqcsQa...

The kyuubi, or Kurama if you prefer, offers Naruto a deal. Kurama trains Naruto, because he doesn't want a weak vessel. Wow, that was so much easier...
124.title: What else?

15.content:
Choice 1: Just couldn't take anymore abuse from the villagers, and when he tries to complain about it to his 'friends' and 'teachers,' they basically tell him to deal with it, it'll get better, they're too busy, or something else along those lines.

Choice 2: Minato and Kushina are resurrected by a new jutsu, (not edo-tensei, but it can be based off of that) and Naruto freaks out when he discovers they're his parents. It gets worse when they have no idea how their son has been treated by the villagers, and they think he'd be happy to see them.

Choice 3: The council decides to seal Naruto's power. Officially, it's due to a failed mission and, the threat of the Akatsuki, but the majority just want hate him.

(Note: Sorry about any errors, I'm writing this on my phone.)
15.title: What caused it?

choices: He works his way through the village he thought would love him by now
155.content: They kill Naruto and he is revived by the sage of the six paths with endless power. He can either immediatly change all of reality to his specifications or he can do it slowly to make people know why these things are happening to them.
155.title: More choices

info.brief_description: Naruto sick of the abuse snaps and gains godly powers...and exacts his revenge on everyone
info.description:
After years of torment by both his peers and the village Naruto Uzumaki snaps and awakens his true heritage gaining incredible deity powers that make the Kyuubi look as weak as a newborn kitten.

Naruto can do anything to anyone...anything is allowed even death to some people! GO CRAZY!
info.pretty_title: Naruto Uzumaki God of the World
